name: Pux Plane
description:
What is Pux Plane?

Pux Plane is a simple Flappy Bird clone made using Kenney's Tappy Plane assets.

Choose your favourite theme and plane colour, and go as far as you can! Challenge family and friends to get that high score!

Have fun!

Puxley (BumblePux)

Why did I make this?

The focus of this project was to improve my programming skills and my writing of clean code. I decided to create a clone of a simple game for this purpose which already had an established design and defined game loop. 

I used a highly simplified Unreal Engine Gameplay Framework approach, which I felt improved the general readability and scalability of the project.

The source code for this project can be found here: https://github.com/BumblePux/PuxPlane
